[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/anchor-generated-image-bank/production/podcast_uploaded_nologo400/3065928/3065928-1580874536977-b0ec4fa260b4c.jpg
| caption=SCP Play Logo designed by Hannah Mullen
| width=250px]]

**Location:** Piedmont, Missouri, SCP Foundation secure facility designation Site-44

**Extradimensional Reality Designation:** 444-P0D-5CP

**Site Purpose:** Site-44 is an experimental containment facility that solely attempts to implement the most advanced technologies, techniques, and anomalies that are at the Foundation's disposal in order to develop more reliable containment procedures for SCPs. The procedures tested at this site are reserved for those SCPs that the Foundation historically has had difficulty in keeping contained. Knowledge of this facility is restricted to security clearance 05 and above for personnel outside of Site-44 due to the danger of testing novel containment procedures and the potential loss of some of the Foundation's most advanced resources. Typically, only one SCP's containment will be tested at a time.

**Incident Description:** A containment breach occurred at Site-44 on the evening of September 5th, 2017. The actions of several Persons of Interest and Site Personnel on this evening set the stage for many extraordinary events to occur within Site-44 and the Foundation as a whole. Outlined below is a brief description of the involved PoI's as well as a developing audio log of their actions and activities.[[footnote]]This is a Table Top RPG Podcast running the game system called [*https://www.evilhat.com/home/monster-of-the-week/ Monster of The Week][[/footnote]]


------

+ SCP Play Trailer
[[include :snippets:html5player
| type=audio
| url=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/anchor-audio-bank/staging/2020-2-11/55944911-44100-2-c2949f4b0beeb.m4a]]

------

**Persons of Interest:**

[[tabview]]
[[tab Miles Miller]]
**Age:** 9

**Character Classification:**[[footnote]]"Character" or "Hunter" Classes as defined by the Monster of The Week playbook.[[/footnote]] "The Mundane"

**Description:** Son of Site-44 Director Dr. Elaine Miller. Born and raised within the Foundation's custody due to certain privileges granted to Dr. Miller. Raised by Dr. Miller in between her Foundation responsibilities with assistance from Miles' caretaker Mr. Clark --who smells bad and likes to eat his own shorts--. //No TV for a week// -- --Mom-- Dr. Miller

(Played/Voiced by Jacob Eck)
[[/tab]]
[[tab Ned Roswell]]
**Age:** 16

**Character Classification:** "The Searcher"

**Description:** Resident of Piedmont, MO and student at Clearwater High School. Expresses an acute interest in the mysterious and macabre. Quickly displays an affinity for observation, study, and interaction with the anomalous.

(Played/Voiced by Daniel Klinger)
[[/tab]]
[[tab Benji Dreyer]]
**Age:** 19

**Character Classification:** "The Spooky"

**Description:** Resident of Piedmont, MO and former Computer Science undergraduate student at Southeast Missouri State University (dropped out). Observed to possess anomalous abilities not understood at time of initial contact. Abilities appear to be magical in nature and manifest in a manner similar to the 16-bit art style of the Super Nintendo Entertainment System's generation of games.

(Played/Voiced by Hannah Mullen)
[[/tab]]
[[tab Agnes Oberman]]
**Age:** 22

**Character Classification:** "The Monstrous"

**Description:** Resides within the hilly region surrounding the town of Piedmont. Ms. Oberman is a half **[REDACTED]**. Information about her and the members of her species is protected. See Incident Report **[REDACTED]**.

(Played/Voiced by Jordan Gamble)
[[/tab]]


[[tab Skylar Kalangitan]]
**Age:** 74 (though she appears to be, physiologically, only 17)[[footnote]] Skylar joined the team after the events of the Circus; please listen to episodes 1 through 21 before reading this Bio (SPOILERS).[[/footnote]]

**Character Classification:** "The Flake & The Monstrous"

**Description:** A late addition to the team, Skylar joined after the events of The Circus arc. Her origins are still unknown but she appears to be a Manananggal (a vampire-like creature from myth believed to have originated in the Philippines). The reasons for Skylar's condition are still unknown at this time.

(Played/Voiced by Cielo Dela Rosa)
[[/tab]]

[[tab Additional PoI's]]
**__Foundation Site-44 Personnel__**
**Site Director**: Dr. Elaine Miller, Level 4 security clearance.
**Assistant to The Site Director**: Mr. Clark, Level 3 security clearance.
**Intern**: Lucas Butler, Level --1-- 0 security clearance.
//Lucas slept through his level 1 briefing appointment and must wait until the next available briefing period as punishment.// --Dr. Miller

(Game Master/Keeper and voicing of additional characters by Kenneth Shaughnessy)

[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

------

+ Season 1
++ SCP Play Ep. 0: Secure, Contain, Preview!
[[tabview]]
[[tab Overview]]
**Publish date: 02/17/2020**
Thinking about checking out our podcast but want to know more about SCP, Monster of The Week, the characters, and/or our cast before you do? Then give this introductory episode a listen! If you feel like you already know enough then go listen to episode 1! We thought this episode would be a nice way to introduce ourselves and answer any questions you may have about the podcast beforehand!
[[/tab]]
[[tab Audio File]]
+ [*https://anchor.fm/scp-play/episodes/SCP-Play-Ep--0-Secure--Contain--Preview-easmpl Visit our Anchor page listen where you'd like!]
[[embedvideo]]
<iframe width="100%" height="100%" scrolling="no" frameborder="no" src="https://anchor.fm/scp-play/embed/episodes/SCP-Play-Ep--0-Secure--Contain--Preview-easmpl"></iframe>
[[/embedvideo]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab Credits/Links]]
**SCPs referenced:**
None are referenced for the first episode.

To learn more about the game system "Monster of the Week", please see their official website:
https://www.evilhat.com/home/monster-of-the-week/
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]

++ SCP Play Ep. 1: An Able Beginning Part 1
[[tabview]]
[[tab Overview]]
**Publish date: 02/17/2020**
Welcome to Piedmont, Missouri and the SCP Foundation Site-44. Meet Miles Miller (Jacob), Ned Roswell (Daniel), Benji Dreyer (Hannah), and Agnes Oberman (Jordan) as they are thrown into some of the dangers of the SCP Universe. Do you think they will be Able to make it out alive?
[[/tab]]
[[tab Audio File]]
+ [*https://anchor.fm/scp-play/episodes/SCP-Play-Ep--1-An-Able-Beginning-Part-1-easmlr Visit our Anchor page listen where you'd like!]

++ SCP Play Ep. 13: The Circus Part 4
[[tabview]]
[[tab Overview]]

Embarrassment, quick getaways, and dirty deeds, oh my! You won't soon forget this episode!

[[=]]
+++ About:
SCP: Secure, Contain, Play!
SCP Play is a table top RPG running a Monster of the Week Campaign based off the SCP Universe. Join players Hannah, Jacob, Jordan, and Daniel on their perilous adventure as they try to survive in SCP Universe as interpreted by The Keeper, Kenneth!
Episodes release at 6:30 am CST every other Monday!
-----

+++++ Visit our podcast hosted at [*https://anchor.fm/scp-play Anchor] or wherever we distribute!
